content.question: Which of the following does the author of Source 1 cite as evidence of cultural exchange between East and West Africa during the First World War?

choices.label: Experiments in architecture and the gathering of souvenirs
Learning the care and maintenance of modern weapons
Spreading methods of disease control and health care

content.answer: Experiments in architecture and the gathering of souvenirs

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
